Pandas read csv

import pandas as pd
csvFile = 'path/file_name.csv'
pd.read_csv(csvFile, encoding = "ISO-8859-1")

Show html element in Jupyter notebook

from IPython.display import display, HTML
display(HTML('<img src="path/file_name.gif">'))
